string.name: location_permission
string.value: Allow the app to obtain location information when running in the foreground during location scenarios

string.name: fuzzy_location_permission
string.value: Allow the app to obtain fuzzy device location information during location scenarios

string.name: location_background
string.value: Allow the app to get location information in the background

string.name: running_background
string.value: Allows the app to perform long-running tasks in the background to get location information

string.name: get_network_info
string.value: Allows the app to get network connection information of the device

string.name: location_switch
string.value: The location switch is off, please check the location settings

string.name: internet_switch
string.value: The network is disconnected, please check the network settings

string.name: wifi_bluetooth_switch
string.value: WiFi or Bluetooth is off, please check the settings
